formula: E.g.f.: -3*x^3/(-1+x)Recurrence: {a(1)=0, a(0)=0, a(2)=0, (-1-n)*a(n)+a(n+1)=0, a(3)=18}3*n!, n>2.E.g.f. G(0)*3*x^3 where G(k)= 1 + x/(1 - x/( x + 1/G(k+1))); (continued fraction, 3rd kind, 3-step). - Sergei N. Gladkovskii, Jul 28 2012
